alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 9:31PM MST until December 27 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Little Colorado River Valley, including the cities of Tuba City, Cameron, Winslow, Holbrook, and St. Johns. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Power outages are also possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County
